text: Sergei Dmitriyevich Romanovtsev (; 29 September 1925 â€“ 26 May 2022) was an officer and colonel of the Soviet Armed Forces. He reached the rank of polkovnik. In 1944 he was awarded the title of Hero of the Soviet Union. Romanovtsev died on 26 May 2022, at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Soviet military personnel of World War II
title: Sergei Romanovtsev
